data.name: Cryoponics
data.description: Cryoponics is a visual exploration of the evolution of organic matter from seemingly non-organic sources. Inspired by the idea of hydroponics used for the growth of plant-based material in space, I set out to create an equal parts alien and equal parts natural flora portraiture.

data.name: Displacement Map
data.description: Displacement map is a series of 3D renders meant to displace contemporary art from the comfort of the white cube, and place it among areas of nature or spirituality. Through these works, I aim to explore the confines of the white cube and the shift in perception when the environment of the object changes.

media.caption: Louise Bourgeois's "Maman" and Jeff Koons's "Balloon Dog" in a forest setting
Joseph Kusuth's "One and Three Chairs" and Ai Weiwei's "Han Jar Overpainted with Coca-Cola Logo" in a temple setting.
Ai Weiwei's "Han Jar Overpainted with Coca-Cola Logo" in Adobe Substance 3D Painter
